We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private MomentumPercent _momp;
// In Initialize()
_momp = MOMP(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_momp.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "MOMP Is Ready", _momp.IsReady);
    Plot("My Indicators", "MOMP Warm Up Period", _momp.WarmUpPeriod);
    Plot("My Indicators", "MOMP Period", _momp.Period);
    Plot("My Indicators", "MOMP Current", _momp.Current);
    Plot("My Indicators", "MOMP Name", _momp.Name);
    Plot("My Indicators", "MOMP Samples", _momp.Samples);
}
# In Initialize()
self.momp = self.MOMP(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.momp.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "MOMP Is Ready", self.momp.IsReady);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "MOMP Warm Up Period", self.momp.WarmUpPeriod);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "MOMP Period", self.momp.Period);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "MOMP Current", self.momp.Current);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "MOMP Name", self.momp.Name);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "MOMP Samples", self.momp.Samples);
